comment:
Regarding those pics of Anderson Cooper in waist-deep water w/ his crew in the shallow part:
1) Those were from Hurricane Ike 10yrs ago, not Florence
2) He wasn't kneeling, you can see him walk around
3) The flooding was actually really bad
https://t.co/Hdrtp2yAGu @DailyCaller
